Given its value and the fact that it's worth $12,000 to you, I propose we strike a deal at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a discounted rate. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer
